caption: Amidst chaos, a young man was ushered into a castle by his servants, with the scene in disarray. At this moment, another short-statured individual approached and inquired about something, causing the young man to grow increasingly irritated. He was swiftly reprimanded by the shorter person. Then, they went out to find someone.In the midst of the tumultuous crowd, a girl was surrounded, subjected to bullying, until a knight came to her rescue. They brought her back to a castle.In another castle, a woman was in a square, and a man on a nearby staircase was engaged in a conversation with her. The woman seemed to be trying to persuade the man to support her cause. She appeared passionate and devout, but the overweight man remained indifferent and composed.In a different place, a young girl was writing a letter.
